name: Telemedicine Platform
description: Virtual doctor appointments, prescriptions, and patient records

issues.title: Build doctor profiles and directory
issues.body:
## Description
Doctor profiles and search.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Doctor profiles
- [ ] Specialties
- [ ] Availability
- [ ] Reviews and ratings
- [ ] Insurance accepted

issues.title: Implement appointment scheduling
issues.body:
## Description
Book doctor appointments.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Calendar integration
- [ ] Time slot selection
- [ ] Patient information
- [ ] Confirmation emails
- [ ] Reminder notifications

issues.title: Create video consultation system
issues.body:
## Description
Video calls with doctors.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] WebRTC video
- [ ] Waiting room
- [ ] Screen sharing
- [ ] Call recording
- [ ] Connection quality

issues.title: Build patient portal and medical history
issues.body:
## Description
Patient health records.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Medical history
- [ ] Allergies
- [ ] Medications
- [ ] Past visits
- [ ] HIPAA compliance

issues.title: Implement e-prescription system
issues.body:
## Description
Digital prescriptions.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Write prescriptions
- [ ] Drug database
- [ ] Send to pharmacy
- [ ] Refill requests
- [ ] Prescription history

issues.title: Add lab orders and results
issues.body:
## Description
Order and view lab work.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Order lab tests
- [ ] Upload results
- [ ] Result notifications
- [ ] Historical results
- [ ] Doctor review

issues.title: Create secure messaging
issues.body:
## Description
HIPAA-compliant messaging.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Doctor-patient chat
- [ ] Encrypted messages
- [ ] Attachment support
- [ ] Read receipts
- [ ] Audit logs
